quote.issuer_name: Beijing Sports and Entertainment Industry Group Ltd.
quote.nm: Beijing Sports and Entertainment Industry Group Ltd.
quote.summary: Beijing Sports and Entertainment Industry Group Ltd is a company principally engaged in the sports and entertainment related industry with focus on air dome construction, operation and management. The Company’s main businesses include exploitation, investment, construction and operation of the innovative and multifunctional sports parks and air-structured stadiums, construction and operation solutions thereto, building ice-and-snow-themed amusement parks, investment, operation and commercial management of sporting projects, operation of Sports club and development, investment and operation of sport-related media. The Company’s other businesses include money lending business and manufacturing and sale of white pigment powder (WPP) business. The Company’s air domes can be widely applied in sports, commercial and cultural tourism, industrial and environmental protection, agricultural warehousing, and highland oxygen enrichment.
quote.office_address:
